name: Warhammer 40k Planet Name Generator
description: Forge names worthy of the God-Emperor! Generate epic and grimdark planet names for your Warhammer 40k campaigns and stories.
introduction: In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only war... and a whole lot of planets! Need a suitably imposing name for the next battlefield in your Warhammer 40k saga? Or perhaps you're crafting a whole new sector of space? Look no further! This generator will churn out planet names dripping with the atmosphere of the 41st Millennium. Prepare to be inspired, Inquisitor!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. Seems easy enough, right? Even a guardsman could manage it.
Observe the glorious name presented before you. Is it suitably grim? Does it evoke the dread and majesty of the Imperium? If not...
Click 'Generate' again! Keep going until you find the perfect name to strike fear into the hearts of heretics and xenos scum.
Copy the name and unleash it upon your unsuspecting players or readers. Watch them tremble before the might of your creativity!

faqs.question: Are these names officially sanctioned by Games Workshop?
faqs.answer: By the God-Emperor, no! This is a fan-made tool for inspiration. Use them as is, modify them, or just let them spark your own creativity.

faqs.question: Can I use these names in my fan fiction or tabletop campaigns?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go forth and spread the grim darkness (and the awesome planet names) far and wide!

faqs.question: Will this generator create names for other Warhammer factions, like Orks or Eldar?
faqs.answer: Currently, this generator focuses on names appropriate for the Imperium of Man. However, future updates may include options for other factions. Stay tuned, and praise the Omnissiah!

faqs.question: I generated a name that sounds... a bit silly. Is that normal?
faqs.answer: The Warp is a strange and chaotic place, and sometimes that chaos spills over into name generation. Just hit 'Generate' again – the God-Emperor provides!

faqs.question: Is this generator safe to use? I don't want to attract the attention of the Inquisition.
faqs.answer: This generator is completely safe! Unless, of course, you use the names to summon daemons or incite heresy. Then you're on your own, citizen.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We welcome your contributions! Leave a comment or suggestion, and we'll consider adding them to the generator's lexicon. For the Emperor!
